overview_of_class: Brand Content in a Social World covers how marketing communications uses the power of ideas to build brands in digital and social media platforms. The primary emphasis is on approaches to generating big ideas that makes brand strategies come alive in ways that engage consumers and achieve business objectives. Students will learn how to create effective brand ideas and how to recognize and evaluate the quality of ideas developed by others. The course includes developing writing and presentation skills to successfully communicate brand ideas that will produce successful marketing communications programs.
name: Brand Content in a Social World
subject: IMC
